\begin{longtable}{p{0.22\textwidth}p{0.73\textwidth}}
\toprule
\textbf{Purpose} & Guarantee timely, accessible publication of governance artefacts, audit findings, and civic responses. \ 
\midrule
\textbf{Obligations} & \begin{itemize}
\item Governance offices \shall{release decision summaries within statutory windows} using canonical templates.
\item Oversight chairs \shall{file audit coverage statements} aligned with transparency tiers.
\item Communications teams \should{cross-link public notices to evidence bundles} for reproducibility.
\end{itemize} \ 
\midrule
\textbf{Verification Artefact} & Governance publication packet including summaries, audit extracts, and cross-layer references. \ 
\midrule
\textbf{AEIP Schema} & \texttt{schemas/governance-decision-summary.jsonld} \ 
\midrule
\textbf{Evidence Fields} & \begin{itemize}
\item \texttt{publication.window_days}
\item \texttt{evidence_links[]}
\item \texttt{audience_profiles[]}
\end{itemize} \ 
\bottomrule
\end{longtable}
